metadata.title: CVE-2022-0154 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab affecting all versions starting from7.7 before 14.4.5, all versions starting from 14.5.0 before 14.5.3, allversions starting from 14.6.0 before 14.6.2. GitLab was vulnerable to aCross-Site Request Forgery attack that allows a malicious user to havetheir GitHub project imported on another GitLab user account.

criterions.comment: gitlab package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
